description:
It happens – you hit the beach, set up your favorite chair... and proceed to steadily sink into the sand. Beach day, ruined. Thankfully, this sturdy ground sheet attaches to your Helinox Camp or Sunset Chair for a pleasant beachside throne experience. You, 1. Sand, 0.

  • Chair legs slide into corner pockets of sheet for security
  • Securely attaches to the centre of the chair for a confidence-inspiring fit
  • Dimensions:47 x 42cm
name: Helinox Ground Sheet Sunset Chair
